alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:27PM EDT until August 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ROBESON...NORTHWESTERN FLORENCE...NORTHWESTERN DILLON... DARLINGTON AND MARLBORO COUNTIES... At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mccoll, or 9 miles south of Laurinburg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Hartsville, Darlington, Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Rowland, Lamar, Quinby, Clio, Rex, Hamer, Brownsville, Darlington Raceway, Swift Creek, Shannon, Chavistown, and Floyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
